text:
Chris Pratt serenading cream scones is everyone on a diet (Picture: Instagram)

Chris Pratt has encompassed the beautiful joys of the dieting ‘cheat meal’ by serenading a scone before an ever-so-sweet nosh.

Presenter Emily Hartridge dies aged 35 after tragic e-scooter accident with lorry

The 37-year-old actor is frequently watching his weight for Hollywood roles like Guardians Of The Galaxy, and has resorted to regularly documenting his dieting treats via series #WhatsMySnack on Instagram.

This episode however is the Oscar moment. He’s singing those treats straight to the Academy.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

In the clip, Pratt can be seen on the River Thames (according to the brilliant caption) wolfing down the sweet delight while crooning The Beatles track, Oh! Darling.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He also gives a shout-out to wife Anna Faris for the sumptuous cinematography. Academy noms all-round.

This isn’t the only time he’s captured his guilty alone-time however, having previously dedicated a rap to a carrot cake muffin.

Incredible.

And if you’re a fan of healthy snacks, you can watch this episode based around an egg and cucumber wrap before leaving the room to never return.

Pratt is currently out promoting Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2, where he stars alongside Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Michael Rooker and Karen Gillan.

Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 releases in UK cinemas on April 28.
